comment.author: 47524421@N08
comment._content: Goodyear XF2G-1 Super Corsair, probably BuNo 14691 ".....The first aircraft manufactured as a true F2G- 1. It used the engine from 13471. First aircraft, to have the 12 inch auxiliary rudder. (Yellow cowl with Blue #9) It was tested at Akron and NAS Patuxent from 10/44 to 6/47 Stricken Navy records 6/30/47. (Source: N. Veronico "F4UCorsair" - N. H. Hauprich, Goodyear)...." Above info from www.airrace.com/CorsairStatusList2.html
